# GreenMotion Cars CRM System

## Project Overview
Complete CRM system for car import business handling inventory, customers, sales, and logistics.

## Tech Stack
- Backend: Python Flask, SQLAlchemy ORM
- Database: PostgreSQL (SQLite for development)
- Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap 5
- Authentication: Flask-Login

## Key Features
- Car inventory management (VIN, make, model, import country)
- Customer management (dealers vs private)
- Sales pipeline and invoicing
- Import logistics tracking
- Document management
- Analytics dashboard
- Role-based access control
